Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2007 06:08PM bradfordvero wrote: I am not sure if you had your mammo yet but there is a program that does pay for the mammo and following care in some cases.  The program is federally funded and state distributed so you will need to contact your state office of Breast and Cervical Cancer Early Detection Fund.  There are requirements to be approved, no insurance or underinsured, 50 or over but I am 46 and they approved me, you need to make at or under the 200% of the poverty income rate.  Even if you did get your mammo and need follow up care for some reason, try to locate them in you state.  Good Luck
Posts.Title: Insurance Coverage MarieL msannie57
